price: 5. Kuwa baarriyiinta ah waxay ka cabbi galaas (khamro saafi ah) oo lagu dheehay Kaafuur.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارَ يَشۡرَبُونَ مِن كَأۡسٖ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna al-abrāra yashrabūna min kasin kāna mizājuhā kāfūran
